scripts.build:wasm: emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_SXFopen_AP202", "_SXFread_table_AP202", "_SXFread_assembly_name_AP202", "_SXFread_next_feature_AP202", "_SXFclose_AP202", "_malloc", "_free"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='createP21Module' -I ./p21/common_lib ./p21/common_lib/*.cpp -o ./public/p21-parser.js
